description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the remote code execution vulnerability in the Microsoft WDAC OLE DB provider for SQL Server (CVE-2024-26166):

1. Download the relevant update package based on your system version using the links provided below.
2. Install the update by following the installation instructions.
3. Restart your system to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- The updates specifically address the heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability.
- Ensure your system is one of the following versions before installing:
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems (10.0.22631.3296)
  - Windows 11 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems (10.0.22621.3296)
  - Windows 11 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems (10.0.22000.2836)
  - Windows 10 for x64-based Systems (10.0.10240.20526)
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.

**Update Packages**:
- For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5035853](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035853)
- For Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5035853](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035853)
- For Windows 11 Version 21H2: [KB5035854](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035854)
- For Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5035845](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035845)
- For Windows 10: [KB5035858](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035858)
